definition: quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: You use all of your senses in guided imagery.
sentences.chinese: 在进行引导式景象刻画时，你要运用到一切感官。

sentences.english: Mr. Alter describes the fallout as 'paying tuition.
sentences.chinese: 奥尔特将反面影响刻画为交学费。

sentences.english: When Picasso is 18 years old, created oneself depict of the first copperplate .
sentences.chinese: 毕加索18岁时，创作了自己第一幅铜版刻画。

sentences.english: A nicely drawn, good-looking face suggests you see the good in others.
sentences.chinese: 精心刻画，好看的脸庞暗示说你看到的是别人的优点。

sentences.english: The uncertainty is described by bounded norm.
sentences.chinese: 不确定项用有界范数来刻画。

sentences.english: The structure of the carved antler indicates its growth stage was spring or summer.
sentences.chinese: 被刻画的鹿角的结构表明其生长期处于春季或夏季。

sentences.english: Streaks of hair fined out using smudge tool and small hard brushes.
sentences.chinese: 用模糊工具和小的硬笔刷来刻画头发的纹理。

sentences.english: Did you see my stipple portrait?
sentences.chinese: 你看见我的点刻画像了？

sentences.english: Yan Zhen's novels focus on the spiritual plight of intellectuals.
sentences.chinese: 阎真的小说专注于对知识分子精神困境的刻画。

sentences.english: This is because reality is entirely different from what the computer screen illustrates.
sentences.chinese: 因为现实中的人和电脑屏幕里刻画的人是完全不同的。
凯西，我喜欢这些蚀刻画。

sentences.english: The cartoon reveals a very thought-provoking scene.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图刻画一个非常发人深思的情景。

sentences.english: The author delineated many characters in his story.
sentences.chinese: 作者在其故事中刻画了许多人物。

sentences.english: Super efficient point in vector optimization problems with set-valued maps characterized by generalized saddle point;
sentences.chinese: 本文研究集值优化问题严有效解的广义鞍点刻画问题。

sentences.english: Characterization of the North China People's support and the people's Liberation Army to fight a bloody battle scenes.
sentences.chinese: 刻画了华北人民支前和人民解放军浴血奋战的场景。

sentences.english: This movie tersely portrays the characters' personalities.
sentences.chinese: 影片洗练地刻画了人物的性格。

definition: to trace over/to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc)/(fig.) to describe/to portray
to model/to mold/(fig.) to create (a character, a market, an image etc)/(literature) to portray (in words)
to draw the outline of/to outline/to sketch/to delineate contours of/to give a brief account of
brush stroke in Chinese painting and calligraphy/brushwork/style of drawing or writing
person/character (in a play, novel etc)/protagonist/CL:個|个[ge4]
vivid and lifelike (idiom); true to life/realistic
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
line drawing in traditional ink and brush style/simple and straightforward style of writing
